Gioco valido divertente da giocare con gli amici se non fosse che se non giochi con gli amici del culo è impossibile arrivare a rank rosso come survivor perché incontri persone che dubito fortemente abbiano due mani. Ma non disperate perché Quando giochi killer invece ti trovi un gioco completamente sbilanciato visto che se non tunneli almeno il primo sopravvissuto non c'è verso di vincere.
Come se non bastasse bisogna aggiungere a tutto questo persone senza vita che escono una volta all'anno solo per acquistare il loro manga preferito, Nulla incontrario se non fosse che quando guardo il profilo di questi esseri se va bene mi ritrovo sbattuto in faccia sulla bacheca di steam Todoroki mezzo nudo mentre se va male delle troie anime nude o ancora peggio Fan Art di killer e sopravvissuti che si scopano a vicenda.
Ma che cazzo avete in testa fatevi una vita dio porco

Game is more active than Team Fortress 2 and almost every Valve game besides CSGO. Game is fun, they keep updating it every few months (major update) and give bug fixes, they also listen to the consumer so that's also nice. Game is kind of boring after a while but new killers/DLC incentivizes you to come back, which is amazing considering not even EA or Bethesda can do something as great as this. They're some of the last devs that actually care, and even though the game is half pay 2 win but half progressive, you can enjoy it without needing to pay for skill. (Unless you purchase a survivor or killer which you need to pay money for them or grind for a bit.), I still wish other companies were this determined to achieve a good playerbase but sadly that isn't the case with most companies anymore. Thank you Behaviour Interactive for giving us a great multiplayer game and giving us some actual good major updates!

Dead By Daylight.
A game where you kill people and get killed.
It's a lovely change of pace from garbage like CoD, FoRtnIghT and any other kinds of fps.
Chances are you'll either get really into it or quit due to the learning curve.

One of the more grindy games in all honesty. 
You'll find yourself forced to level up characters you'll probably never play up to level 40 just to unlock their "teachables".
Unlocking the teachable allows you to then use it on all your other characters.
Most good teachables are locked behind DLC, so you either need to fork out the cash, then grind that character up to 40 for all their teachables or wait and pray to the rng gods that the perk appears in the "Shrine Of Secrets" which is a store which you can spend earned points on unlocking the teachable without the work. 
The catch is the perks in there are completely random and only provide 2 killer perks and 2 survivor perks a week.

The game has been continuously updated since I started playing back in 2016. The fact that it's still being supported is a reason for merit, though, the developer's aren't the brightest and frequently update graphics or random things nobody asked for whilst ignoring giant balance issues or overpowered perks.

If you're a killer you'll hate "skeleton keys" (item), objects of obsession (perk), and especially four-man swf's who use COMS. 
You'll usually be forced to camp / tunnel them so you have a bit more of an enjoyable game rather than getting yourself so stressed out.
Skeleton keys will allow survivors to get a cheap and easy win just by finding the hatch which happens when survivors + gens left = 5. So if all four survivors only have 1 more gen to do, they can then find the hatch and win.
The object of obsession is a stupidly overpowered perk that will allow the survivor to see the killer at all times. It also allows the killer to see the survivor. Alone, this perk wouldn't be too bad, however most "ooo"'s are in a group, to which they will then convey every action you do to their team.
Four-man SWF's. Just four friends to play in a Survive with Friends. Again, usually wouldn't be so bad. But with coms, discord or some other software to talk to each other. It just becomes more of a cheating tactic.


If you're a survivor you'll hate "moris", noed, campers, and tunnelers. However, once you get to higher ranks you'll rarely be tunneled or camped for no reason (bringing a key or using object usually triggers this.)
Mori's allow the killer, once he has hooked you once, to instantly kill you. He earns a lot fewer points and will depip from this. A cheap, easy win like the keys.
Noed isn't that bad of a perk. If you're playing survivor right, you'll never need to worry about it. Noed or no one escapes death, is a perk that will allow the killer to 1-shot kill all survivors IF the survivors ignore totems until his totem is destroyed.
Campers and tunnelers. The first being a wide term you probably know already. A tunneler is a killer with tunnel vision. He will target one person and oftentimes go after them again and again and again until they're out of the game. Not fun for the survivor at all.

If you are going to get this game, which I recommend you do, there are some quick things you should know.

Playing killer is a lot more challenging than survivor however you'll learn maps 10x faster as the killer, earn much more blood points, and objectively have more fun as the killer.
Look out for fleeing crows to give you an idea of where that pesky survivor ran off to if you lose his scratch marks.
Try not to run from one side of the map to the other, try to focus on close generators, and give up on any that are too far so you can better protect close ones.
You can open the exit doors yourself, to prevent survivors from 99'ing it and cheesing the end game gameplay.


Playing survivor you'll be in for a bit more of an easy, less stressful time. 
You'll earn a lot fewer blood points and you'll be learning the game a hell of a lot slower.
Try to remember to be cautious around crows. They will startle and flee when you perform any fast actions around them, giving the killer an idea as to where you are.
Try not to sprint over windows or other obstacles if the killer doesn't yet know your location. If you're close to him when you do this, you will trigger a loud noise event to the killer and show him exactly where you are.
Whenever you sprint, you leave red marks all over the floor wherever you go which are invisible for you but very obvious for the killer.
Hiding in bushes is so much more effective than you may think, instead of running, try hiding.

No matter what side you play, watch YouTubers. Otzdarva, Tru3Talent, Monto, noob3, space coconut, and more will greatly assist you with guides, tips, and tricks. Honestly, just watching them and seeing how to tackle certain situations will help you learn.


The most important thing to remember when playing. Don't just play one side. You'll improve much slower. 
Not only that, it helps you get into the enemy's mind, and, most vitally it will stop you from being an entitled survivor.

Oyun gayet güzel ve eğlenceli, özellikle tek başınıza değilde bir arkadaşınızla duo olarak girince bu eğlence katlanıyor fakat 1-2 eksik yanı yok değil:
*perkler çok dengesiz oyun belli bir rankın üstünde belli 8 perk arasında dönüyor bu katil içinde kaçan içinde bu şekilde bu perkler olmadan oyun size eziyet oluyor ve bu perkleri elde etmesi çok olay ve hızlı bir süreç değil.
* Yine yüksek ranklarda katil - hayatta kalan arasındaki güç dengesizliği çok ortaya çıkıyor, işini iyi bilen bir survivor çok rahat katili uzun süre meşgul edebilip bir de üstüne zorbalık yapabilir.
bunlar dışında oyun eğlenceli ve sürekli güncellenmeye devam ediyor. Bence kesinlikle şans verilmesi gereken bir oyun.

И так всем привет тем кто читает этот обзор.Я разделю свой обзор о игре Dead by Daylight на 5 частей,6 часть пояснение некоторый слов.
1-Я наиграл в дбд 588 часов на момент записи обзора и что могу сказать игра стоит своих денег.
2-В дбд очень много веселья и фана,особенно интерестно когда фулл стаком пошли фанится или трайхардить))
3-Когда пытаешься апнуть 4 ранг на мане такое ощющение что ты просто растворяешься в игре
4.С каждым часом ты начинаешь понимать всё больше и больше и умение играть возростает.
5-Раскажу о моём мнении по поводу игры.В игре вы будете бомбить когда вас загенрашат,затуннелят,закемпят и иногда это может вас сильно растроить но ииногда и развеселить.Но если вспомнить о плюсах и минусах этой игры то можно дать оценку игре 7/10 или 76/100.
6-Пояснение-трайхардить-играть по информации и сосредоточется и не веселится,дбд-Dead by Daylight в сокрощении

Читеры заполонили ДБД крайне не рекомендую покупать эту игру, разрабам тупо пофигу, главное контент рулить, а качество и так сойдет..
Если коротко - играли вы в детстве в салочки? Так вот, дбд это уже взрослые салочки с кровью и мрачной атмосферой. Здесь вы либо вода либо сурв. В дбд свои правила салочек и свои классные механики и сюжеты. Каждая игра будет отличаться от предыдущей. Сыграв пару десятков игр вы постепенно прокачаете свой скилл. Играйте как за убийцу так и за сурвов, так вам будет легче понимать как нужно играть против своих соперников. А ну и ещё, кэмперство и тунелинг не запрещены также как и часы, осколок, орех, стояк и прочие имбалансные скилы, не обижайтесь на маньяка если он вас затунелил и закэмпил, в этом суть игры. Если он кэмпит то остальные чинят гены, он проигрывает. Всё в ваших руках.

Après 1 ans et demi et 1380 heures de jeu, je me lance.

Le jeu :
Son aspect horrifique fait le taff, après toutes ces heures de jeu, je continu d'avoir des sursauts et des piques d'adrenaline.
Sa particularité étant son aspect asymétrique, 1 tueur contre 4 survivants, cela peut impliquer des problèmes concernant l'équilibrage (que je trouve personnellement convenable) mais peu de jeu pousse à une coopération aussi intense.
Même si l'expèrience / skill est important dans le gameplay, la stratégie de jeu n'en est pas pour autant délaissée.

La communauté :
Chacun a sa façon de jouer, comme partout il y a des rageux, il y a aussi de très bon teammates et parfois des parties complètement hors du commun (tous les bugs ne sont pas gamebreaker). Il suffit parfois de s'accroupir et se relever 2 ou 3 fois pour avoir avec vous un teammate prêt à sacrifier sa vie pour la vôtre. La communauté youtube/twitch et très active et produit du bon contenu (not Otzdarva, ZubatLEL, Ayrun, 4Gamers et j'en passe).

Les 3 + :
+ Très sympa pour jouer avec des amis, la coop est un aspect important du jeu. (+Cross-plateforme)
+ Un investissement de temps dans le jeu vous garantira du progrés dans votre gameplay (le jeu ne "s'essoufle" pas)
+ Les maps sont variées, assez bien équilibrées et font l'objet de refonte graphique

Les 3 - :
- Il ne sera pas rare de rencontrer des bugs ou des hitbox douteuses, cependant cela reste tout à fait jouable.
- Le jeu est assez gourmand en ressource.
- Le contenue payant : si vous souhaitez débloquer tous les survivants et tueurs du jeu, vous pouvez compter je pense aux alentours de 150 ou 200 euros. (le prix des skins est également plutôt élévé).
La moitié des personnages peut être débloqué en jouant mais dîtes-vous qu'il ma fallut 30 euros et 1300h de jeu pour débloquer tous les survivants (sans acheter de skin).

Conclusion : Je recommande le jeu vivement, particulièrement le rôle de survivant pour jouer avec des amis et celui de tueur pour les hard-gamers. Bien que jamais essayé, la version mobile ne me paraît pas adapté au mode de jeu.

Touf89, membre de la no-NOED team

밸런스 배제하고 보면 컨텐츠와 컨셉이 뛰어난 편이라 생각한다.

새로운 살인마와 생존자가 등장하면 같이 등장하는 맵들은 그 분위기가 적절하며, 특히 살인마의 외관은 타게임과 비교했을때 징그럽고 괴상하지 않을 정도를 적절하게 지켜 불편함이 적게 플레이 할 수 있다고 생각한다.
특히 영화 DLC는 고증이 잘되 있기 때문에, 직접 영화를 본 사람은 몰입감 있게 플레이 할 수 있다.(특히 맵)

이 게임은 멀티플레이 및 대전 게임이기에 밸런스도 신경써야 하지만 이런 여러 디테일이 있기에 게임이 몰입감 있게 돌아갈 수 있는 것이고, 우리가 오랫동안 즐겨도 재밌는 것이다! 살인마를 놀리는 것도 좋지만 제작자들이 의도한 디테일도 찾아보며 플레이하면 더 오래 즐길 수 있을 것이라 생각한다. 근데 매튜야 벽보고 손들고 있으라니까 왜 내리냐?
